value.title: Display selected value from slicer to Power BI Report

Meaning, we need to set the Dynamic value for our Title column based on the slicer selection. How can we achieve this? How can we set dynamic title value for our Power BI visualization?

value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard

There are three main steps you have to do to get this to work.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together
value.excerpt: With the release of Microsoft SQL Server 2016, I look at how Reporting Services and Power BI work together. value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway

value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily
